QuestData.Title: Nowhere to Run
QuestData.Description: The mistress has put me in charge of this lot. Our primary mission is to get in there, corner the rats, and kill 'em all, including Bloodfang.$B$BYou've done us a solid service in gettin' the information, $n. Join in the glory and help us drive a sword through their miserable skulls!$B$BLet me know when you're ready and I'll call for the charge.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Escort Master Forteski through the Deep Elem Mine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Master Forteski through the Deep Elem Mine.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lady Sylvanas Windrunner at the Sepulcher in Silverpine Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: WHAT!?$B$B<Sylvanas shrieks.>$B$BCROWLEY!!!!!$B$BBastards. Those were some of our strongest soldiers. I have underestimated Crowley and Bloodfang for the last time. Clearly they are an enemy the likes of which we have never seen - willing to sacrifice their own to set a trap like this... unheard of in Alliance warfare.
